item.title: Teleports don't work[PI]
item.dc:creator: @l0gin1 l0gin.
item.description:
@l0gin1 wrote:

Ok I won’t re-post all of that lol

But where it says int actionButtonId = Misc.hexToInt(c.getInStream().buffer, 0, packetSize);

right under it add System.out.println("Buttonid : " + actionButtonId);

Everytime you click a button such as teleports on your server in the CMD it will print what button you pressed

item.title: Teleports don't work[PI]
item.dc:creator: @david7147 david7147
item.description:
@david7147 wrote:

My home teleport works, but none of my other teleports work.[code]

clickingbuttons:

[code=]case 50253:
case 117131:
case 4146:
c.getDH().sendOption5(“Godwars”, “King Black Dragon (Wild)”, “Dagannoth Kings”, “Chaos Elemental (Wild)”, “”);
c.teleAction = 3;
break;

		case 51005:
		case 117154:
		case 4150:
		c.getDH().sendOption5("Mage Bank", "Green Dragons(13 Wild))", "East Dragons (18 Wild)", "Ardounge PVP (+1)", "Falador PVP(+0)");
		c.teleAction = 4;
		break;			
		
		case 51013:
		case 6004:	
		case 117162:
		c.getPA().startTeleport(2850, 3432, 0, "Modern");
		//c.getDH().sendOption5("Mining", "Smithing", "Fishing/Cooking", "Woodcutting", "Farming");
		//c.teleAction = 5;
		break; [/code]
